goal: Identify key correlations between various movie attributes to understand factors impacting movie success.
persona: A seasoned data analyst with over 7 years of experience in the film industry, specializing in statistical analysis to uncover insights into movie performance and profitability. Passionate about using data-driven approaches to advise production companies on optimizing their investments and marketing strategies to maximize box office success. Interested in exploring emerging trends within the entertainment sector to provide strategic recommendations.
